description:
The tragic and sad history of Big Mom is revealed! From abandonment, rescue, and again to ruin, Big Mom`s voracious hunger has brought her into conflict with others from the very beginning!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Moms Geheimnis! – Elban und das kleine Monster!
Le secret de Mama. L`île des géants et la petite bête
Mom no Himitsu: Elbaph to Chiisana Kaibutsu
Mom`s Secret! The Giant`s Island Elbaph and a Little Monster!
Секрет Мамочки! Остров гигантов Эльбаф и маленький монстр!
سرّ مام! جزيرة العمالقة إلباف والوحش الصّغير
マムの秘密 巨人の島[エルバフ]と小さな怪物
